bibdata.title: IEEE Recommended Practice for Cement Plant Electric Drives and Related Electrical Equipment
IEEE Recommended Practice for Cement Plant Electric Drives and Related Electrical Equipment

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: All electric drives, including motors and control wiring associated with machinery or equipment commonly used in the manufacturing areas of cement plants are covered. Recommendations are not intended to apply to power distribution circuits. These recommendations apply to electrical equipment having a supply voltage of 13 800 V or less.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
